version_description:
* New terrain with water 
* Fuel simulation/drop tank 
* Game mode train/easy/real 
* Input settings 
* New missions, campaign 
* New targets 
* Multiplayer with chat 
* Improve heli physics 
* Various bug fixes and improvements
